import React from "react"; const styles = { container: { background: "linear-gradient(rgba(29, 90, 140, 0.7), rgba(29, 90, 140, 0.7)), url('/scl.JPG') center/cover no-repeat", minHeight: "100vh", color: "white", position: "relative", fontFamily: "Arial, sans-serif", }, nav: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", padding: "18px 40px", background: "rgba(0,0,0,0.25)", }, logoSection: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "16px", }, logo: { height: "38px", width: "38px", backgroundColor: "#fff", borderRadius: "8px", marginRight: "10px", }, title: { fontWeight: 700, fontSize: "2.1rem", letterSpacing: "2px", background: "linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(249, 86, 86, 1) 0%, rgba(253, 229, 51, 1) 100%)", WebkitBackgroundClip: "text", WebkitTextFillColor: "transparent", }, dLetter: { color: "linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(249, 86, 86, 1) 0%, rgba(253, 229, 51, 1) 100%);", fontWeight: "bold", }, navLinks: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "28px", fontSize: "1.2rem", }, loginBtn: { backgroundColor: "#27e066", border: "none", borderRadius: "4px", color: "white", padding: "10px 20px", fontWeight: 700, cursor: "pointer", fontSize: "1rem", }, contentCenter: { display : "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", minHeight: "calc(100vh - 70px)", textAlign: "center", }, slogan: { fontWeight: 500, fontSize: "1.4rem", letterSpacing: "1.2px", marginBottom: "42px", marginTop: "26vh", }, enrollBtn: { marginTop: "18px", backgroundColor: "#27e066", border: "none", borderRadius: "6px", color: "white", padding: "16px 34px", fontWeight: 700, fontSize: "1.1rem", cursor: "pointer", }, }; function HomePage() { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}
{/* Insert logo image here */}
ARUNODAYA
Home Contact
{/* Page content */}
BEHIND EVERY STEP OUR CHILDREN TAKE THERE ARE HANDS THAT HOLD, HEARTS THAT CARE,
AND WHO BELIEVE IN THEIR POTENTIAL
); } export default HomePage;
